t: National Gallery of Art Launches Reimagined Brand
s: Energized by the monumental architecture of the National Gallery's campus, Pentagram united the old and the new, the classic and the modern when creating our new brand. The emphasis on National in our logo reflects our renewed commitment to serve as the nation's art museum.

The National Gallery of Art Reopened Today with a New Brand Identity—and New Leadership on the Horizon
s: May 14, 2021 - So reads the new tagline for the National Gallery of Art in Washington, D.C., which reopened to the public today—for the first time since November 2020—with an overhauled visual brand calibrated toward messages of optimism and equality.
